ygData.subject: Here i go again :-P
ygData.msgSnippet: I need to find a better Melee weapon for my young, on her own Druid, Amaiya (Ayonae Ro).  BF had suggested asking around for a Fine Steel Scimitar but I have
ygData.messageBody:
I need to find a better Melee weapon for my young, on
her own Druid, Amaiya (Ayonae Ro). BF had suggested
asking around for a Fine Steel Scimitar but I have so
little money right now and the guy I talked to last
night wanted 10pp for the one he had...sheeeesh, I
don't even have 1pp yet...lol(but hey I am having
fun)..sow, no wait, that should be so, any suggestions
on a less expensive "weapon" and where i might find
it. I tend to hang out close to the lifts so I can
run like hell if I have to so if there is somewhere
near there that would be helpful...

Wishing you all safe travels..

Amaiya, the Evercurious
Druid, Ayonae Ro (aka as Naara)
